DOC.brief_summary: To determine optimal cut-off value for the TopQ cut-off on the DRI OCT Triton plus
DOC.brief_title: TopQ Cutoff Threshold Validation Study for DRI OCT Triton Plus
DOC.detailed_description: Scans with a TopQ score below the optimum cut-off should be considered to be poor or unacceptable quality, and scans with a TopQ score above the cut-off should be considered good or acceptable quality. The study will evaluate the predetermined cut-off values by investigating measurement variability of scans.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Participants must be at least 18 years of age Participants must be able to complete all testing (all OCT scans) Participants must volunteer to be in the study and sign the consent form Exclusion Criteria Subject with history of ocular disease or ocular pathology
